name: 轮回序列 Samsara Agent
description:
RogueLite's skills catalyze endless freshness!




Choose your own mystical abilities and create marvelous combinations of reactions！




Passionate and fun leader challenge!




A strategic selection of level abilities!Rogue++


Game Features

■ [Easy to understand] Use the keyboard "W", "S", "A", "D" to control your character, the left mouse button and right mouse button toward the target to fight!
■ [Fast-paced] Battles take less than 30 minutes per game!
■ [Strategy Upgrades] Pick up experience to upgrade your character and unlock different types of strategy skill sets!
■ [BOSS Challenges] Meet different boss challenges with the strategies of your choice! Every choice you make is important!
■ Survive the onslaught of enemy zombies!
